__e: Today's letter is about a couple who were made for each other soulmates, as they say in english
That there is something. There actually is.. Love.
Yeah, but he said that they're soul mates, and he'll wait for however long it takes for her to get out.
But there is a voice... in our souls... which tells us what to do.
And do you understand that one of the souls that your friend carries within him... is my son?
Know what happens if you keep souls around after their time?
No. But you think you know what happens to the souls of men?
"3" was the first time when you see the souls of children.
I know what gold does to men's souls.
"3" was the first time when you see the souls of children.
I left my mother and father's spirits back home.
- He has a way of connecting... with others- to their souls- in a way that I've never seen in any other person.
Tell me again why we're spending our vacation on the Island of Lost Souls.
Those poor, lost souls at the hospital are the only reason this place is on the map.
That's who Alan talks to, you know, all those poor souls lost that night.
Man, are there a lot of pissed-off souls down here that want a piece of her.
Do you realize you have the destiny of their souls in your hands now?
Unlike the rest of these sorry souls around here... We're not afraid of you.
Don't tell me it's about morals and souls and fucking angels. I mean, shit to that.
I can see into your soul, and you're the man who left his child in the care of a drunk.
I want your blood... I want your souls... and I want 'em both right now.
